title: I got DCed mid game, reconnected and my ping became constantly higher?
body:
Am I being routed through a new hub? 3 minutes into my last game, I got DCed from Riots side because I immediately checked if my internet was working. I quickly closed league and opened it.
I reconnected to the game, only to see that my ping has more than doubled.

I usually have a consistent ping of 18-23, now it is a constant 50. Am I being routed through a different hub for some reason?

Please someone tell me

Ran a traceroute and heres what I got

Traceroute has started…

traceroute to 104.160.131.1 (104.160.131.1), 64 hops max, 72 byte packets
 1  192.168.0.1 (192.168.0.1)  0.786 ms  0.728 ms  0.385 ms
 2  96.120.40.81 (96.120.40.81)  8.716 ms  8.487 ms  8.806 ms
 3  xe-5-1-0-sur01.auburnhills.mi.michigan.comcast.net (68.85.85.181)  8.439 ms  8.990 ms  15.694 ms
 4  68.86.122.177 (68.86.122.177)  11.095 ms  16.062 ms  10.961 ms
 5  be-33668-cr02.ashburn.va.ibone.comcast.net (68.86.90.13)  24.787 ms  25.479 ms  23.814 ms
 6  hu-0-10-0-0-pe07.ashburn.va.ibone.comcast.net (68.86.83.66)  22.677 ms  22.802 ms  23.353 ms
 7  e0-0.cr01.atl01.mzima.net (75.149.228.166)  41.342 ms  42.133 ms  41.805 ms
 8  104.160.137.35 (104.160.137.35)  42.276 ms  48.556 ms  45.317 ms
 9  ae35-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net (104.160.159.26)  42.666 ms  41.610 ms  41.892 ms
10  104.160.131.1 (104.160.131.1)  42.124 ms  42.036 ms  42.240 ms

Ping test gave me this

Ping has started…

PING 104.160.131.1 (104.160.131.1): 56 data bytes
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=0 ttl=55 time=42.472 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=1 ttl=55 time=44.357 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=2 ttl=55 time=45.861 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=3 ttl=55 time=50.092 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=4 ttl=55 time=42.806 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=5 ttl=55 time=42.604 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=6 ttl=55 time=43.015 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=7 ttl=55 time=42.152 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=8 ttl=55 time=42.108 ms
64 bytes from 104.160.131.1: icmp_seq=9 ttl=55 time=42.747 ms

--- 104.160.131.1 ping statistics ---
10 packets transmitted, 10 packets received, 0.0% packet loss
round-trip min/avg/max/stddev = 42.108/43.821/50.092/2.359 ms

This is very abnormal as I usually run 18-23 ping.

replies.body: Sounds like your network may have had a hiccup.  Is everything okay now?  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for that match to get an overview of what happened.  If it comes up with connection issues or packet loss, give our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide a go to help troubleshoot.  Hope that helps!

Yeah, everything is okay now, I don't know what happened, it's like for a few hours my ISP decided to route me through a longer string of hops.

Thank you for the reply!

I've been having a similar issue for awhile now. My ping was at a constant 22 all the time for awhile after the servers moved near Chiacgo. For the past few weeks it'll hover at 36 or 51, randomly throughout the day. I don't get it either.
